WorkflowDef.Name: Workflow Columbia Suicid Severity Rating Scale questionnaire, part Suicidal Ideation

Description.TranslatedText: Workflow Columbia Suicid Severity Rating Scale questionnaire, section "Suicidal Ideation"

Transition.Name: Transition from 'Whish to be dead question' for 'Lifetime' to branching for 'Whish to be dead question' for 'Lifetime' and 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' for 'Lifetime'

Branching.Name: Branching after question 'Wish to be dead' - 'Lifetime'

Transition.Name: Default transition from 'Wish to be dead' to 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts'
Transition from the branch to 'Wish to be dead' - 'Past 1 month', when subject answered 'Yes' to 'Wish to be dead' - 'Lifetime'
Transition to 'If yes:describe' for 'Wish to be dead'
Transition from 'If yes:describe' for 'Wish to be dead' to question 2 'Non-specific Active Suicidial Thoughts' - 'Lifetime'

Transition from 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' for 'Lifetime' to branching for 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' for 'Lifetime' and branching after questions 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' and before questions 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act'

Branching.Name: Branching after question 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' - 'Lifetime'

Transition.Name: Default transition from 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' to 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts'
Transition from the branch to 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' - 'Past 1 month', when subject answered 'Yes' to 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' - 'Lifetime'
Transition to 'If yes:describe' for 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts'
Transition from 'If yes:describe' for 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' to branch before question 3 'Non-specific Active Suicidial Thoughts' - 'Lifetime'

Branching.Name: Branching after questions 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts'

Transition.Name: Transition to question 3 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act'
Conditional Transition to section 'Intensity of Ideation'
Transition to section 'Suicidal Behavior' from Section 'Suicidal Ideation'
Transition to Branch after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act - Lifetime'

Branching.Name: Branching after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act' - 'Lifetime'

Transition.Name: Transition to 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act - Past 1 month'
Transition to 'If yes: describe' after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act - Past 1 month'

Transition to 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan' from 'If yes: describe' after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act - Past 1 month'

Default transition from question 3 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act - Lifetime' to question 4 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Lifetime'
Transition to Branch after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Lifetime'

Branching.Name: Branching after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Lifetime'

Transition.Name: Transition to 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Past 1 Month'
Transition to 'If yes: describe' after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Past 1 month'
Transition to 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent' from 'If yes: describe' after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Past 1 month'
Default transition from 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Lifetime' to 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent - Lifetime'
Transition to Branch after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent - Lifetime'

Branching.Name: Branching after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent' - 'Lifetime'

Transition.Name: Transition after branch after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent - Lifetime' to 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent - Past 1 month'
Transition to 'If yes: describe' after question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent - Past 1 month'
Default Transition from 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent - Lifetime' to Section 'Intensity of Ideation'

Question.TranslatedText: Lifetime: Time He/She Felt Most Suicidal

Decode.TranslatedText:
Wish to be Dead
Subject endorses thoughts about a wish to be dead or not alive anymore, or wish to fall asleep and not wake up.
Have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?

Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts
General non-specific thoughts of wanting to end one’s life/commit suicide (e.g., “I’ve thought about killing myself”) without thoughts of ways to kill oneself/associated methods, intent, or plan during the assessment period.
Have you actually had any thoughts of killing yourself?

Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act
Subject endorses thoughts of suicide and has thought of at least one method during the assessment period. This is different than a specific plan with time, place or method details worked out (e.g., thought of method to kill self but not a specific plan). Includes person who would say, “I thought about taking an overdose but I never made a specific plan as to when, where or how I would actually do it…and I would never go through with it.”
Have you been thinking about how you might do this?

Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan
Active suicidal thoughts of killing oneself and subject reports having some intent to act on such thoughts, as opposed to “I have the thoughts but I definitely will not do anything about them.”
Have you had these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them?

Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent
Thoughts of killing oneself with details of plan fully or partially worked out and subject has some intent to carry it out.
Have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself? Do you intend to carry out this plan?

ConditionDef.Name: Subject answered 'Wish to be dead' question with 'Yes' for 'Lifetime'

Description.TranslatedText: Subject answered 'Wish to be dead' question with 'Yes' for 'Lifetime'

ConditionDef.FormalExpression: ClinicalData.SubjectData.StudyEventData.ItemGroupData.where(ItemGroupOID='S_SUICIDAL_IDEATION_1' and ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_TYPE' and Value='1')) .ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_LIFETIME' and Value='Y')

ConditionDef.Name: Subject answered 'Wish to be dead' question with 'Yes' for 'Past 1 month'

Description.TranslatedText: Subject answered 'Wish to be dead' question with 'Yes' for 'Past 1 month'
Description.FormalExpression: ClinicalData.SubjectData.StudyEventData.ItemGroupData.where(ItemGroupOID='S_SUICIDAL_IDEATION_1' and ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_TYPE' and Value='1')) .ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_PASTMONTH' and Value='Y')

ConditionDef.Name: Subject answered questions 'Whish to be dead' ('Lifetime' and/or 'Past 1 month') AND question 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' ('Lifetime' and/or 'Past 1 month') negatively

Description.TranslatedText: Subject answered questions "Whish to be dead" ("Lifetime" and/or "Past 1 month") AND question "Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts" ("Lifetime" and/or "Past 1 month") negatively.

ConditionDef.FormalExpression: ClinicalData.SubjectData.StudyEventData.ItemGroupData.where(ItemGroupOID='S_SUICIDAL_IDEATION_1' and ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_TYPE' and Value='1')) .where(ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_LIFETIME' and Value='N') and (ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_PASTMONTH' and Value='N') or (ItemData.where(ItemOID='Q_IDEATION_PASTMONTH').not())) )
